translations: 含水层储能系统（aquifer thermal energy storage）

sentences.sentence: This fact ates easy adoption and use of modeling technique.
sentences.translation: 这一事实，ATES容易采用建模技术和使用。

sentences.sentence: This fact ates easy adoption and use of modeling technique.
sentences.translation: 这其实阿泰容易通过建模技术和使用。

sentences.sentence: Aquifer thermal energy storage (ATES) has become a relatively well-known energy storage technology in many parts of the world.
sentences.translation: 地下含水层储能已成为一项在世界上较为知名的储能技术。
